title: Nearby Share on Android now officially supports group transfers
content:
Nearby Share is one of the fastest and easiest ways to transfer photos, videos, and other data from one Android or Chrome OS device to another, similar to how Apple AirDrop works. However, the feature has been lacking the ability to send one file to multiple recipients at once, which Google is finally addressing. Google

The post Nearby Share on Android now officially supports group transfers appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google has been testing Nearby Share group transfers for at least a year, but now the functionality is going live for everyone.
